title: section 23 of the Industrial Training Act 1967 (No. 5 of 1967) and by section 38
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Industrial Training (Civil Engineering
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Industrial Training (Civil Engineering 

Industry) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited industrial training (civil engineering industry) order 2023

title: section 23 of the Industrial Training Act 1967 (No. 5 of 1967) and by section 38
heading: 2. The following activities are hereby declared to be designated industrial
text_raw:
2. The following activities are hereby declared to be designated industrial 

activities for the purposes of the Industrial Training Act 1967 (No. 5 of 1967): 

(a) 

the design of construction projects; 

(b) 

the management and supervision of construction projects; 

(c) 

(d) 

the review of all aspects of construction projects for compliance 
with applicable specifications and requirements, including, but 
not 
legal 
industry, 
limited 
requirements; and 

technical and/or 

to, client, 

the use of testing and measurement methods, including, but not 
limited to, instrumentation and software, to gather and analyse 
data relating to construction projects, for the purpose of any of the 
matters at (a) – (c).
text_norm: 2 following activity hereby declared designated industrial activity purpose industrial training act 1967 (no 5 1967) (a) design construction project (b) management supervision construction project (c) (d) review aspect construction project compliance applicable specification requirement including legal industry limited requirement technical client use testing measurement method including limited instrumentation software gather analyse data relating construction project purpose matter (a) - (c)

title: section 23 of the Industrial Training Act 1967 (No. 5 of 1967) and by section 38
heading: In this Order:
text_raw:
3. 

In this Order: 

"construction projects" means projects which wholly or mainly relate to 
construction operations; 

"construction operations" has the meaning assigned to it in section 1 of the 
Construction Contracts Act 2013 (No. 34 of 2013).
text_norm: 3 order construction project mean project wholly mainly relate construction operation construction operation meaning assigned section 1 construction contract act 2013 (no 34 2013)

title: section 23 of the Industrial Training Act 1967 (No. 5 of 1967) and by section 38
heading: 4. The provisions of this Order shall not apply to any activity of industry
text_raw:
4. The provisions of this Order shall not apply to any activity of industry 

for which a separate industrial training order is, for the time being, in force. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 23rd June, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [318] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of An tSeirbhís 
Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna, 

8 June 2023.

Scileanna was affixed in the presence of: 

SEAN AYLWARD 

SOLAS Chairman 

a member of An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus 
Scileanna, authorised by An tSeirbhís Oideachais 
Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna to act in that behalf. 

ANDREW BROWNLEE 

SOLAS CEO 

a member of An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus 
Scileanna, authorised by An tSeirbhís Oideachais 
Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna to act in that behalf.

title: section 23 of the Industrial Training Act 1967 (No. 5 of 1967) and by section 38
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna was established under the 
Further Education and Training Act 2013 to promote training in industry and 
commerce. 

This Order defines the activities of the civil engineering industry in relation to 
which An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna shall exercise its 
functions in the creation of statutory apprenticeships.
